tooltips.icon: This is the icon for the super power. You can use all icons that font awesome provides

buttonHelp.nothingSelected: No super power has been selected
buttonHelp.appliedSelected: At least one selected super power is applied on a hero. Therefore it can not be deleted.

form.iconDesc: Choose an icon for the super power. You can use all Font Awesome icons e.g. fa-taxi

superPowerDeleteConfirm.superPower: Do you really want to delete the super power "{{name}}"?
superPowerDeleteConfirm.superPowers: Do you really want to delete the following super powers?

created.singular: The super power {{name}} has been successfully created!
created.plural: {{$count}} super powers have been successfully created!

updated.singular: The super power {{name}} has been successfully updated!
updated.plural: {{$count}} super powers have been successfully updated!

deleted.singular: The super power {{name}} has been successfully deleted!
deleted.plural: {{$count}} super powers have been successfully deleted!
